forum.content: Need someone to talk to. Studying was never my thing. I dropped out of college because I was under a lot of pressure. Both educational and financial. Now I’m working as a waitstaff, but I can’t do this all my life can I? Is college really that important? Really that necessary? For now I just wanna make money and gain social experience in different fields. Advice, anyone? 😭
forum.title: What am I gon do with my life?
